import React, {useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' const Form = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); console.log(product) axios.post(`http://localhost:8000/api/create/product`, product) .then(res => console.log(res.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } const handleChange = (e) =>{ setProduct({...product, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } return (

Product Manager

) } export default Form
